name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in full-stack development and a strong proficiency in **Python**, focusing on building scalable and efficient solutions. I’m well-versed in various programming languages including **Go**, **C++**, and **C#**, as well as leveraging modern cloud technologies for optimized performance. My technical toolkit includes **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and deployment, alongside developing APIs and services that meet enterprise architecture standards. 
In my previous roles, I have successfully led the development of high-performance applications across diverse industries, strategically utilizing cloud environments like **Azure** and **AWS**. My background encompasses expertise in **microservices architecture**, deployable systems with **event-driven** capabilities, and robust CI/CD automation processes.
Additionally, I possess a solid foundation in AI/ML integration, developing machine learning pipelines and utilizing tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow** to enhance software capabilities for predictive analytics. I excel in implementing secure systems adhering to compliance standards, leveraging my deep understanding of regulatory requirements.
